ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F00_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="20a74003b18246299c6398279448ab2f" Scale="1"/]First, a preliminary trial. See if you can defeat all
the Bulborbs, Bulblaxes, and Bulbears.
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F01_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2237c979cb0444d39f65612ead03e8d6" Scale="1"/]Build yourself a clay mound, and come find me.
Be careful not to freeze in the meantime.
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F02_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="0b5e04f7e7b44f0798c356599bb0004d" Scale="1"/]Those who perfect the art of excavation can call
themselves Dandori masters. Don't let it be an
elusive dream... Dig away!
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F03_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2e962333fb214bf793a5f8b1eaf534ea" Scale="1"/]Collect all the treasures in the sea, then come
find me.
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F04_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="fdc86c781ed14bfe8a8cf5fa7b05ff88" Scale="1"/]When the nine dragon jewels have been gathered,
the way will open. Do you have what it takes to
capture the white jewel?
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F05_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9af8f0a3b9614e50ae4948b5e96b9765" Scale="1"/]Can you outsmart the gimmicks and defeat the
gambit? Show me the extent of your wits.
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F06_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="55b897c902334011b13d278b7dc1ab8a" Scale="1"/]Try scattering the area with overwhelming force.
How many can you thump out at once?
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F07_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d3fd487f210e4e2dae1d4f6d1af6c6ea" Scale="1"/]Powerful Purples and whirlwind Whites. Can you
put them both to work effectively?
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F08_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="185e22266cfb4f64a906772e7d70c918" Scale="1"/]A territorial battle with survival on the line.
Don't let natural selection get the better of
you. Show those creatures who's superior.
ChallengeCaveUI.CaveESP000_F09_Outline:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="e3bdca5b470a43e295431ef28d387393" Scale="1"/]Can you capture the purple jewel of the earth?
Use your skills to determine what needs to be
done and what doesn't.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave003_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="6c2043e9f03447f7b38f36ac879c3e4a" Scale="1"/]A place to learn the basics of the art of Dandori.
Consider what you need to do and how to do it,
then take action!
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave008_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="de7ab08f18144399bcb78808a6d9bee2" Scale="1"/]An underground lab that sparks and sputters
with flames and electricity. Use these two Pikmin
types to create a Dandorified chemical reaction.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave015_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="be1d138754204efebefbbe9db0c564f8" Scale="1"/]A giant bathing room with several baths. Make
use of Blue Pikmin so your Dandori skills aren't
left dead in the water.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave031_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="d64a6d080df5425b9a169d8684eaf150" Scale="1"/]A distribution center for ultra-heavy refrigerated
food supplies. Switch between two bases, and
transport things over the frozen water.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave027_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="eedf5f36ff1c4384b2a3931abe3839ec" Scale="1"/]A mechanized incinerator that reaches high
into the sky. Burn the straw, and secure the
switch for the moving walkway.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave020_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="e75aacd8fdea48a8a3d744375d1ecc63" Scale="1"/]A demanding course with a steep cliff that will
challenge your Dandori skills. Your teamwork
with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] could make all the difference.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave029_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="9ec3f5e43ba644e1965637da67c81d48" Scale="1"/]A research center for Rock Pikmin. Demonstrate
your Dandori skills, and show them how to break
those crystal walls.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave028_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="12f0617056734607a4f24dd2770c1632" Scale="1"/]Cold storage so chilly you'll freeze if you don't
warm up. Dividing work between Red Pikmin and
Ice Pikmin is the key to Dandori mastery here.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave030_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="11ba841e6ff34387957062830885a580" Scale="1"/]An aquarium where Dandori skills using
Blue Pikmin will really shine. Hurry and gather
Yellow Pikmin from the distant islands.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave034_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="65ecfa299f124322a4b7d89043b63db1" Scale="1"/]Educate yourself in all things Ice Pikmin as you
seek Dandori mastery. Carefully consider when
to freeze and when to melt the water.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave017_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="01b92144fd9542f699576473fcd3dcb8" Scale="1"/]A dojo for Dandori mastery, where secret training
is carried out day and night. Every time you push
the switch, gates open.
ChallengeCaveUI.Cave032_F00_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="4a935fa18eec42db875050692215ccb5" Scale="1"/]An oasis it may be, but there is no time for rest
in the art of Dandori. Use three types of Pikmin,
and aim for Dandori mastery.
ChallengeCaveUI.CavePortal_CaveRuleDetail_04:
[UE:Meta key="d3635a8a189341a49c5e1ebeb8b68de5" Scale="1"/]Collect all the treasures and creatures
within the time limit.
